statements: UPDATE NutritionPlans SET dietary_restrictions='None', dietary_preferences='Vegetarian' WHERE plan_id=1;
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET performance_goals='Weight Loss', athlete_id=3 WHERE plan_id=2;
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET dietary_restrictions = 'Gluten-free', performance_goals = 'Lose Weight' WHERE plan_id = 1;
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian', performance_goals = 'Build Muscle', athlete_id = 2 WHERE plan_id = 2;
UPDATE athletes SET age = 25, dietary_restrictions = ARRAY['gluten-free'] WHERE athlete_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE nutrition_plans SET protein = 100, carbs = 150, fats = 50 WHERE plan_id = '98765432-12ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';

UPDATE athletes SET age = 25, weight = 180, dietary_restrictions = ARRAY['vegetarian', 'gluten-free'], performance_goals = ARRAY['gain muscle', 'improve endurance'] WHERE athlete_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE nutrition_plans SET calories = 2500, protein = 150, carbs = 300, fats = 70 WHERE athlete_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND plan_name = 'Lean Muscle Plan';
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET dietary_restrictions = 'Vegetarian', preferences = 'Low carb' WHERE plan_id = 1;
UPDATE Athletes SET age = 25, height = 175.5, weight = 70.3 WHERE athlete_id = 3;
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET preferences = 'Low carb, high protein' WHERE plan_id = 1;
UPDATE Athletes SET weight = 180.5, height = 72.3 WHERE athlete_id = 2;
UPDATE Athletes SET dietary_restrictions = 'Vegan', performance_goals = 'Increase stamina' WHERE athlete_id = 1
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET plan_calories = 2000, plan_description = 'Balanced diet' WHERE plan_id = 3
UPDATE Athletes SET dietary_restrictions = 'Vegan', performance_goals = 'Improve speed and endurance' WHERE athlete_id = 1;
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET plan_calories = 2000, plan_description = 'High-protein diet for muscle gain' WHERE plan_id = 3;
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET plan_name = 'Weight Loss Plan', calories = 1500, protein = 120, carbs = 200, fats = 50 WHERE plan_id = 1;
UPDATE Athletes SET age = 28, gender = 'Male', height = 175.5, weight = 75.2 WHERE athlete_id = 3;
UPDATE Athletes SET age = 25, weight = 75.5 WHERE athlete_id = 123;
UPDATE NutritionPlans SET calories = 2000, protein = 100, carbs = 300, fats = 50 WHERE athlete_id = (SELECT athlete_id FROM Athletes WHERE name = 'John Doe');
